item.title: Lower Cargo Compartment Fire Detection Systems (Fwd and Aft) Detectors – Configurations With -136 or Later AFOLTS Card (M10427 in P-54 Card File)

remarks.para: One in each compartment may be inoperative.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to affected CARGO FIRE Light "FWD OR AFT CARGO - ONE SMOKE DET INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
